hero.title: Decentralised naming for wallets, websites, & more.

portableUsername.title: Your web3 username
portableUsername.text: No more sandboxed usernames. Own your username, store an avatar and other profile data, and use it across services.

cryptocurrencies.title: One Name For All of Your Addresses
cryptocurrencies.text: No more copying and pasting long addresses. Use your LNS name to store all of your addresses and receive any cryptocurrency, token, or NFT.

statistics.title: LNS is the most widely integrated blockchain naming standard.

decentralisedWebsites.title: Decentralised Websites
decentralisedWebsites.text: Launch censorship-resistant decentralised websites with LNS. Upload your website to IPFS and access it with your LNS name.

dns.title: Use Traditional Domains
dns.text1: The native name suffix for LNS is .BCH, which has the full security benefits of being blockchain-native.
dns.text2: You can also use LNS with DNS names you already own. LNS supports most DNS names, including:

additionalFeatures.title: Additional Features
additionalFeatures.recordType: Create your projectâ€™s own record type.
additionalFeatures.textRecord: Attach profile information to your LNS name with text records.
additionalFeatures.subDomains: Create LNS subdomains as usernames for your project.
additionalFeatures.dns: Store and serve traditional DNS records with certain names.
additionalFeatures.tor: Use LNS to more easily access Tor .onion hidden services.

about.hero: The Bitcoin Cash Name Service is an open source blockchain-based naming protocol.

aboutLNS.title: About LNS
aboutLNS.text: Funded by MistSwap in early 2022, LNS forked from ENS onto smartBCH with a focus on decentralization, inexpensive fees, and robust tokenomics. LNS development is led by mainnet_pat and is a public good, a basic piece of Internet infrastructure that belongs to the community. We welcome all feedback and contributions!
aboutLNS.support: We have received generous financial support from:
aboutLNS.support2: Representatives of LNS participate in the greater Internet community:

benefits.title: Benefits of Bitcoin Cash
benefits.text: Though it supports a wide range of non-smartBCH assets, LNS runs on the smartBCH blockchain. This brings the benefits of decentralization, security, censorship-resistance, and programmability of the smartBCH blockchain to Internet naming, enabling new features like self-custody, composability in the greater smartBCH smart-contract ecosystem, and more.

root.title: Managing the LNS root
root.text: To facilitate the possibility of upgrades and maintenance, the LNS root is controlled by a four of seven multisig, with members of related projects as keyholders. In the long term, we would like the root multisig to be replaced by some form of distributed decision making process, as such systems become available.
